entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
